entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [net7] Creating a cross-targeted `net7.0-ios` + `net6.0-ios` packages forces consumers to build with net7 workloads #81057
  • System.IO.Pipes.PipeStream no-op's writing 0 bytes #81053
  • Random jit stress failures in JIT\Directed\arglist\vararg #81049
    8.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'dest->TypeGet() == src->TypeGet()' in 'Vector2_3_4Test:RunVector2Tests()' during 'Morph - Global' (IL size 348; hash 0xcf5ce7a3; FullOpts) #81048
    8.0.0
  • Erroneous `IOException` in `TarWriter.WriteEntry` on MacOS #81047
    8.0.0
  • Add DeflateStream remark indicating we don't guarantee same results between releases #81043
    8.0.0
  • System.IO.Ports.SerialPort 7 no longer throws TimeoutException but System.IO.IOException with message mentioning timeout #81035
  • .NET 8 dotnet/runtime Testing for Debian 12 (Bookworm) #81034
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: SegmentTree<T> collection #81032
  • XmlSerializer does not deserialize to DateOnly #81030
  • [wasm][debugger] Move Shift-Alt-D functionality from aspnetcore repo to runtime repo #81028
    8.0.0
  • Exception when Deserializing Nullable<double> #81025
  • Enable building NativeAOT for iOS platforms #81024
    8.0.0
  • TaskCancelledException in HttpConnectionPool #81023
  • [.NET6 fix port] NullabilityInfoContext.Create throws IndexOutOfRangeException #81022
    Future
  • JIT: Last-use copy elision based on ref counts and liveness interact in incorrect ways #81019
    8.0.0
  • JIT: Assertion failed '!m_rootNode->OperIsLocal() && !m_rootNode->OperIsLocalAddr()' during 'Morph - Structs/AddrExp' #81018
    8.0.0
  • INumber<T>.Create(out bool successful), [area-System.Numerics] #81016
  • Application crash - access violation in coreclr!SVR::gc_heap::mark_object_simple1 #81015
  • Valgrind reports Native AOT shared library memory leaks #81008
  • Exception not being thrown when null value encountered for non-nullable type #81007

Closed

  • PipeReader ReadAsync Do not cover all the case of completion of stream #80039
  • Binding a dictionary mutates existing values instead of replacing #79770
    8.0.0
  • ArrayTypeMismatchException in nested arrays with function pointers (android) #80095
    7.0.x
  • dotnet-counters: Missing System.Runtime-Counters when publishing a trimmed app #79648
    8.0.0
  • Add regex source generator tests that compare against known output #63300
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add timeout data to CancellationToken to retrieve the cancellation timeout passed to CTS.CancelAfter #81045
  • [Proposal]: Add ZZZ date/time format specifier #81040
    Future
  • .net core 3.1 DeflateStream is incompatible with .net framework 4.8 DeflateStream #58038
    Future
  • How to manage connections towards Apache when MaxKeepAliveRequests is not infinite? #79610
  • Make big endian, little endian chosable in BitConverter #80982
  • NetworkChange NetworkAddressChanged event throws NetworkInformationException on Android #77822
    8.0.0
  • API Proposal: Add BigEndian APIs to BinaryWriter and BinaryReader #77736
    Future
  • Http/SSl StressTest build failures #80706
    8.0.0
  • Distributed Transaction .Net 7 - Lost process #80776
  • Add Complete and TryComplete methods to the System.Threading.Channels.ChannelReader #26235
    Future
  • System.Threading.Channels: Peek all channel content #50634
    Future
  • Need ChannelReader.TryReadAll #54038
    Future
  • Why SemaphoreSlims are not as optimized as Channels? #77098
    Future
  • [Task/ValueTask] Perf regression on Net 5 vs NetCore 3.1 #46130
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Avoid allocations when adding existing items to the blob heap. #81059
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] removed native RWLock #81058
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Update the JIT to track `Span.Length` and `ReadOnlySpan.Length` as "never negative" #81055
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix publishing to Arcade when there are no merged tests in the set #81054
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • WIP: [wasm] Wasi build improvements #81052
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Promote Tier0 methods with loops to InstrumentedTier0 #81051
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix Configuration Binding with Instantiated Objects #81050
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Re-enable System.Threading.Tasks tests for desktop interp #81046
    area-System.Threading.Tasks
  • [release/6.0] Don't pass --minimize to Xcode 13.3 dsymutil #81042
    Servicing-consider, area-Infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • Publish `UpDownCounter` and `ObservableUpDownCounter` Events for System.Diagnostics.Metrics #81041
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, community-contribution
  • Eliminate a bounds check in `NumberBuffer` #81039
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Avoid losing messages for memory-mapped stress log #81038
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [browser] benchmark fix aggressive trimming #81037
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Assist JIT in eliminating bounds checks #81036
    community-contribution
  • JIT: Switch tailcall implicit byref optimization to use last use information #81033
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Add Statement::m_treeListEnd #81031
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][jit] arm64 neon opcodes #81026
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Speed up frozen string dictionaries and sets by ~25-30% #81021
    area-System.Collections
  • [mono][interp] Remove dependence on svar/dvar when computing call offset #81017
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Use RunContinuationsAsynchronously for block completion tasks #81013
  • [DRAFT] Test -test parameter in CI #81012
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix handling of postponed messages in TargetCore #81011
    area-System.Threading.Tasks
  • [NativeAOT] correctly initalize CONTEXT before failing fast #81010
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [webcil] Minor cleanups #81009
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono

Merged

  • [wasm][debugger] Implement support to symbolOptions from dap. #79284
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [Mono] Fix function pointer check #80855
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Add expected output tests for regex source generator #80937
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [mono][aot] Free LLVM module after AOT. #81014
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Update suppressions now that netframework facade has forwards #79465
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm] Disable legacy interop measurements #81027
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • JIT: Allow forwarding field accesses off of implicit byrefs #80852
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • NativeAOT: Optimize static fields of gc types #80969
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix HttpStress & SslStress #80713
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Fixed array delete in debugger.cpp #79638
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Remove "promoted struct death vars" map #80501
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Eliminate `ToArray` bounds checks #81001
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution

Updated

  • Optimize the SqlGuid struct #72549
    area-System.Data.SqlClient, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Add MemoryExtensions.Count #80662
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Initial support for zmm in .NET #80960
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • [wasm] Add direct jit calls to jiterpreter #80968
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Improve XmlSerializationWriter.WriteTypedPrimitive #76436
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • Add reflection introspection support for function pointers #81006
    area-System.Reflection, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Add support for the Aho-Corasick algorithm in regexes. #71588
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Remove the dotnet (1) man page #78229
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Implementation of Lemire's nearly divisionless method #79790
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Copy local intellisense xmls for assemblies with source of truth. #79134
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [Merge-on-Red] - Implement XML log fixer for Helix #80751
  • Make System.Reflection.Emit public types abstract #78544
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Implement DivRem intrinsic for X86 #66551
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • JIT: build pred lists before inlining #81000
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Continuation] - Enable the fundamentals behind libraries tests compiled via Crossgen2 #80946
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 8.0.0
  • Fix a typo. #78105
    area-Infrastructure
  • Remove unnecesary library selection checking #79577
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Enable SIMD #80797
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Create live publishing workflow #79775
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Add SYSLIB* analyzers to global configs #80930
    area-Meta
  • [wasm] Use newer ubuntu 20.04 images #80808
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Add additional case where public signing cannot be used #77998
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Fixed CA1854 occurrences #80996
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Create skeleton for the ComInterfaceGenerator #80887
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Refactoring tests to support both external and loopback servers #74579
    area-System.Net, needs-author-action, 8.0.0
  • WASM Toolchain Support for ARM64 #80955
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [IGNORE][wasm] perf - debugging #80796
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, perf-pipeline
  • [mono] Introduce designated direct pinvokes to mono aot compiler #79721
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [release/7.0] [Mono] Fix function pointer check #80927
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-meta-mono, 7.0.x
  • [NativeAOT] Objective-C exception propagation #80334
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Replace successive "ldr" and "str" instructions with "ldp" and "stp" #77540
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • [Android] Bump target SDK version in Android manifest #80923
    os-android, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Propagate cancellation tokens to TrySetCanceled in Dataflow #80978
    area-System.Threading.Tasks
  • [mono] Build mono logging profiler on s390x #72049
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • [Android] Add option to skip generating apk for a specific project #80909
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasm][libs] Fix `WasmAppHost`, and `AppBundle` for library tests #77719
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Optimize "new DateTime(<const args>)" via improvements in JIT VN #81005
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Replacing exception strings with those stored in the resx file (#34056) #78341
    area-CoreLib-mono, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] [mono][aot] Disable dedup for wrapper with a return type which has a … #81003
    Servicing-consider, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 7.0.x
  • Mono musl support #76500
    area-Infrastructure-mono, community-contribution
  • Set IsDynamicCodeCompiled as a managed constant to help #72762
    area-CoreLib-mono
  • Support building a mono-based .NET Runtime on x64 #68424
    area-Infrastructure-mono, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Allow retaining the original casing for known header values #80754
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.x
  • Enable CA1859 - Use concrete types when possible for improved performance #80848
  • Split TryRead implementation into TryPopulate and TryCreateObject #79659
    area-System.Text.Json
  • [mono][aot] Emit native-to-managed wrappers for [UnmanagedCallersOnly… #80918
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Ignore the property with JsonIgnore when generating source code #80967
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • [wasm][icu] ICU files sharding + custom icu data loading for WASM #80421
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Fix generic parameter data flow validation in NativeAOT #80956
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Initial work to port EventPipe library to NativeAOT #80382
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Uncover IlcGenerateMstatFile #80998
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
